TopicTitle: Staging with an engine and a decoupler in the same stage doesn’t seperate the ship.

Articles.Content:
When I put a decoupler and an engine above it, with both set to activate in the same stage, the engine activates but the decoupler doesn’t seperate from the engine.

 KSP2 version: 1.0 (or release, whichever is higher)

Windows 10

CPU: 5600x

GPU: RTX 3060 OC 12GB

Edited February 27, 2023 by Youre_Arent
Added specs

Confirmed, I have the same bug. Decoupler fairing will be jettisoned, engines fires but stages do not seperate-

Workaround: Either put engine and decoupler in seperate stages or decouple manually (via right click on decoupler)
